title: Fort Exploration
tagline: in which ancient secrets and dangers are uncovered
summary: The party investigates an old campsite and follows tracks into the ruined fort.
They encounter and defeat a giant insect ambush inside the fort.
A temple to the Five Siblings is found, containing an altar with a magical 'Aagir's Everlight'.
They discover a magical Horn of Silent Alarm and the petrified explorer Arcus with a transforming coin.
The party destroys a cursed obsidian stone, ending the unnatural rampaging of beasts.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship uncovers a temple with magical artifacts and breaks a curse causing beastly rampages inside a ruined fort.
